member.name: T:Overloop.HealthScheduleApp.Api.LambdaEntryPoint
member.summary: This class extends from APIGatewayHttpApiV2ProxyFunction which contains the method FunctionHandlerAsync which is the actual Lambda function entry point. The Lambda handler field should be set to Overloop.HealthScheduleApp.Api::Overloop.HealthScheduleApp.Api.LambdaEntryPoint::FunctionHandlerAsync
